All Classes

Class Description
AuthenticationController
This AuthenticationController class is a RestController.
AuthenticationService
This class is used to generate tokens when the defined user sign-in.
CustomUserDetailsService
This class was created to implement UserDetailsService, which is the default user service of Spring Security.
DataResult<T>
This class is used to return a DataResult object {T data, boolean success, String message}.
ErrorDataResult<T>
This class is used to return a ErrorDataResult object {T data, false, String message}.
ErrorResult
This class is used to return a ErrorResult object {false, String message}.
ExternalController
This CustomerController class is a RestController.
ExternalService
This class is the class in which the logical operations of the requests to be sent to the external service are made.
GsonHttpMessageConfig
This class is the Gson configuration class.
IAuthenticationService
This is an interface of AuthenticationService class.
IExternalService
This is an interface of ExternalService class.
IExternalServiceRequest
This interface sends a request to the external service and receives a response, thanks to the call method of the retrofit.
IJwtProvider  
IUserService
This is an interface of UserService class.
JwtAuthorizationFilter  
JwtProvider  
Logging  
Messages
This class has constant messages
Microservice2MainServiceApplication
This class is the main class of the project, project runs from this class
Result
This class is used to return a Result object and its subclasses.
RetrofitConfiguration
This class is the retrofit configuration class, OkHttpClient is configured for HTTP requests and defined as the infrastructure of the retrofit.
RetrofitUtils
This class is created so that the execute method that will be applied in more than one method is not repeated.
SecurityConfig
This class is the web security configuration class.
SuccessDataResult<T>
This class is used to return a SuccessDataResult object {true, T data, String message}.
SuccessResult
This class is used to return a SuccessResult object {true, String message}.
User
* This class is an Entity Class.
UserDao
This interface acts as the data access layer
UserPrincipal
This class was created to implement the UserDetails interface of Spring Security.
UserService
This class is the class in which user-related logic operations are performed.
